summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4642 for the improvement of 3rd Avenue South, from Virginia Street to Jackson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction and reconstruction of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54301 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
